You will want to set the path to the folder where the data is. As in:

```{r}
setwd("~/Code/r_programming/assignment_1/")
```

```{r}
source("pollutantmean.R")
pollutantmean("specdata", "sulfate", 1:10)
## [1] 4.064
pollutantmean("specdata", "nitrate", 70:72)
## [1] 1.706
pollutantmean("specdata", "nitrate", 23)
## [1] 1.281
```

```{r}
source("complete.R")
complete("specdata", 1)
##   id nobs
## 1  1  117
complete("specdata", c(2, 4, 8, 10, 12))
##   id nobs
## 1  2 1041
## 2  4  474
## 3  8  192
## 4 10  148
## 5 12   96
complete("specdata", 30:25)
##   id nobs
## 1 30  932
## 2 29  711
## 3 28  475
## 4 27  338
## 5 26  586
## 6 25  463
complete("specdata", 3)

```
